title: The Hermit
description: There are some things you just canâ€™t live without. About the Story When Dr. Ryan Wallace retreats to the Alaskan wilderness to find peace with his past, the last thing he expects is to stumble across a broken woman barely clinging to life. As he watches her fight her way back from hell, his own problems begin to pale in comparison. When she returns to her world, he finally understands...there are some things you just can't live without. Discover two people strong enough to fight their personal demons and find a love that trumps their pasts. Another dramatic romance from Always the Good Girl, Shayne McClendon.
author: Shayne McClendon
